name: Papa Jam's Pizzeria
description:
Welcome to Papa Jam's Pizzeria! No you're not gonna make pizzas silly. You're job is to take out the other restaurant owners in town. Have fun busting some kneecaps!

A,W,S,D- To Move

E- To Interact

Space- To Shoot

Click- To Attack

Shift- To Sprint

There are no Secrets, Easter Eggs, hacks, or anything of the sort. Why would you even think there were!?

Don't fullscreen.
